data.quote: You are what you believe yourself to be.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can't hear them anymore.
data.author: Michele Ruiz

data.quote: Write the story that's in your heart and not the one you think will pay the most money.
data.author: Brenda Jackson

data.quote: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
data.author: Sheryl Sandberg

data.quote: We are all broken, that's how the light gets in.
data.author: Ernest Hemingway

data.quote: When you are going through hell, keep going...
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: We are only as blind as we want to be.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
data.author: Est√©e Lauder

data.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: I like things to happen. And if they don't happen, I like to make them happen.
data.author: Winston Churchill
